oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Agriculture in U.S. Urban Areas: Building Bridges Between Organic Farms and Education
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Oberholtzer, Lydia
Dimitri, Carolyn
Pressman, Andy
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farm economics
Food systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The proposed paper for the 18th IFOAM Organic World Congress will address the results of a 2013 national survey of urban farms in the United States. Production and marketing practices, focusing on organic urban farms, will be highlighted.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Oberholtzer, Lydia; Dimitri, Carolyn and Pressman, Andy (2014) Organic Agriculture in U.S. Urban Areas: Building Bridges Between Organic Farms and Education. Paper at: IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
